programme.title: Into the Forest (2015)
programme.desc: A worldwide power outage sends the globe toward the brink of the apocalypse in this riveting thriller, forcing two sisters living in an isolated house in the Canadian wilderness to adapt to their new reality and fight for survival..

programme.title: Down Terrace (2009)
programme.desc: Recently released from jail and determined to find the snitch who landed them there, veteran criminal Bill and his son Karl (Robin Hill) hunt for the traitor as their colleagues drop by seeking the latest updates in this darkly comic crime thriller. Later, Karls girlfriend announces that she is pregnant, but the good news is overshadowed by the fact that Bill thinks he has identified the rat..

programme.title: Curse of the Pink Panther (1983)
programme.desc: Bumbling French Insp. Jacques Clouseau disappears and an equally inept New York City cop is charged with finding him and the prize Pink Panther diamond that has also gone missing..

programme.desc: Ang Lees slice of life about married couples coping with indifferent children, adultery and wife-swapping in 1970s suburbia..

programme.desc: This incredible documentary profiles 38 Ukrainian Jews who survived World War II by hiding in caves for 18 months..

programme.title: Small Soldiers (1998)
programme.desc: Tommy Lee Jones leads an all-star voice cast in this tale of action figures that come to life..

programme.title: The Sea of Trees (2016)
programme.desc: A depressed American businessman makes a pilgrimage to Aokigahara, Japans notorious "Sucide Forest", with intentions to kill himself. But a chance encounter with a badly injured Japanese man awakens the desire to live within both of them. As they partner together to struggle their way out of the dense forest, they slowly open up about the traumas that brought them there..

programme.title: San Andreas (2015)
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot races to rescue his estranged daughter after a massive earthquake devastates California..

programme.title: Shut In (2016)
programme.desc: In this unnerving drama, a child psychologist holed up in New England with her disabled son learns that one of her patients, a young boy, has disappeared. When the search for him proves fruitless, she begins to believe that his ghost is haunting her..

programme.title: Up in the Air (2009)
programme.desc: Ryan Bingham works for a company that specialises in firing people, and hes forced to take a newcomer named Natalie along on a business trip in order to show her firsthand what he does. Along the way, Ryan begins to reflect on his lonely life and develops a relationship with fellow frequent flyer Alex Goran..

programme.title: Get Shorty (1995)
programme.desc: John Travolta shines in this adaptation of Elmore Leonards novel about a movie-loving loan shark who pitches a story idea to a producer while collecting a debt..

programme.title: White Men Cant Jump (1992)
programme.desc: A white con artist hustles basketball games against black players who dont realize he is actually a gifted hoopster, and one of his unsuspecting victims becomes his "agent," arranging his various scams around L.A., and the duo quickly start piling up the wins together..

programme.title: The Family (2013)
programme.desc: An American mob boss and his family are relocated to France through the Witness Protection Program, but they soon draw the attention of some dangerous underworld figures who are determined to see them dead..

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai (2019)
programme.desc: The staff and visitors of the Taj Mahal Palace Hotel struggle to deal with the 2008 Mumbai attacks. Over the course of a few days, they try to survive an encounter with Pakistani terrorists who are each armed with high-end weapons and explosives..

programme.title: The Exception (2016)
programme.desc: An SS captain is assigned as the new head of security for Germanys former ruler, Kaiser Wilhelm II, who was exiled to the Netherlands after WWI. However, the position is really a cover for his pursuit of a spy who is sabotaging the Nazi war effort..

programme.title: Trumbo (2015)
programme.desc: Biopic of blacklisted screenwriter Dalton Trumbo, whose career was destroyed by anticommunists when he refused to testify before the House Un-American Activities Committee..

programme.title: Krisha (2016)

Their awkward love triangle gets complicated by the arrival of a handsome and newly single guest..

programme.desc: Jays pal Shorty returns from Costa Rica and stays at Jays house so they can reconnect, but he spends more time with Gloria than with Jay. Meanwhile, Alex wants to shed her good-girl image and prove to Claire that shes in a sexual relationship with Ben..

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.Sub-title: Its the Great Pumpkin, Phil Dunphy
programme.desc: Phil and Claire want to celebrate Halloween in a big way, but no one shares their enthusiasm. Meanwhile, Mitch and Cam are frustrated by how long Jay is taking with their kitchen remodel; and Glorias hospitality wears thin when Cam oversteps his boundaries..

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire wants to throw a party for Jays wedding anniversary to atone for her mood at his nuptials. As part of the festivities, Phil plans to perform a magic trick featuring Gloria appearing out of thin air in her wedding dress, which may no longer fit..

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay honours the entire family on their recent successes during the Thanksgiving toast, even though that isnt quite true. Phil works hard to master a classic magic trick and prove hes not the family failure..

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Pritchett-Dunphy-Tucker clan recount their biggest celebrity encounters, including Phil showing a house to his musical hero despite the intense pain radiating from a very inconvenient part of his body. Also: Jays day at jury duty takes an unexpected turn when he gets to serve it alongside one of Americas biggest football icons; and Mannys encounter with his favourite playwright and a celebrated actor and comedian dont go as expected..

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: After leaving his real estate firm to strike out on his own, Phil decides a solo camping trip in the wild will be just what he needs to boost his confidence. Meanwhile, Mitchells plan to teach Cam a lesson in gullibility and Lily a lesson in responsibility backfires..

programme.title: Miracle Workers
programme.desc: Lone wanderer Sid and warlord Freya struggle to adjust after moving from the apocalyptic wasteland to the suburbs..

programme.title: Family Matters
programme.desc: Urkel strikes a deal with singer Johnny Gill: Urkels treasured baseball card in exchange for serenading Laura. Carl and Harriette discover that their love nest is of the outdoor type. Bob: Thom Sharp. Harriette: JoMarie Payton..

programme.title: Family Matters
programme.desc: Urkel, Eddie and Waldo appear on a TV dating show that Laura claims is sexist. Pat: Derek McGrath. Oneisha: Mary Morrow. Tanya: Judette Warren. Nicole: Lisa Marie Russell. Waldo: Shawn Harrison. Laura: Kellie Shanygne Williams. Urkel: Jaleel White..

programme.title: Family Matters
programme.desc: Its hasta la vista to the criminal element after Urkel revives his robot for use in solving a rash of convenience-store robberies on Carls beat. Robber: Matt Landers. Urkelbot: Michael "Shrimp" Chambers. Urkel: Jaleel White..

programme.Sub-title: Contracts, Rules and a Little Bit of Pig Brains
programme.desc: George Sr. and Georgie go camping with Meemaws new boyfriend, but things get complicated when her ex-boyfriend tags along; Sheldon and Missy invent a game..

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.Sub-title: A Slump, a Cross and Roadside Gravel
programme.desc: Sheldon and Georgie mine for platinum in roadside gravel. Also, Mary is concerned when Missy misuses religion to help with a batting slump..

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.Sub-title: A Boyfriends Ex-Wife and a Good Luck Head Rub
programme.desc: Meemaw meets Dales ex-wife, June. Also, Sheldon is forced to work on a group project with reluctant college students..

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Sheldon visits CalTech for the very first time; Meemaw tries to cheer up a jealous Missy; and Georgie is furious when Mary listens in on a phone call with his girlfriend..

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.Sub-title: An Academic Crime and a More Romantic Taco Bell
programme.desc: Sheldon accuses Dr. Sturgis of plagiarism. Then, Mary looks for a girl trophy for Missys baseball ceremony..

programme.Sub-title: A Couple Bruised Ribs and a Cereal Box Ghost Detector
programme.desc: The Cooper family must nurse the school librarian back to health after George Sr. hospitalizes her. Also, Meemaw gives Georgie relationship advice..

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Conclusion. As Ross and Emily prepare to wed, Rachel makes a frantic attempt to reach London before the ceremony. Elsewhere, there is no love lost between Rosss and Emilys fathers..

programme.title: Friends
programme.Sub-title: The One After Ross Says Rachel

programme.title: Friends
programme.Sub-title: The One with All the Kissing

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes pregnancy comes to fruition; Monica and Chandler have their first fight..

programme.title: Friends
programme.Sub-title: The One Where Phoebe Hates PBS

programme.title: Friends

programme.title: Friends

programme.title: Friends

programme.title: Friends
programme.Sub-title: The One with the Thanksgiving Flashbacks

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross loses it when someone eats his sandwich at work; keeping up appearances for Monica and Chandler makes Joey look bad; Phoebe and Rachel take a lit class..

programme.title: Friends
programme.Sub-title: The One with the Inappropriate Sister

programme.title: Friends
programme.Sub-title: The One With All the Resolutions

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is only allowed to bring one guest for his trip to the CERN science complex in Switzerland, and hes forced to choose between Sheldon and Penny..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon misses an opportunity to meet comics mogul Stan Lee, who appears in a cameo, when he has to go to traffic court after getting a ticket because of Penny..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys go to a garage sale and find a ring from "The Lord of the Rings" film, and the rare find threatens their friendship..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends try to help Sheldon overcome his fear of speaking in public..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Wil Wheaton returns and once again battles with Sheldon, this time in a bowling match; and Penny and Leonard have a fight that threatens their relationship..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon tells a lie to appease Penny and Leonard, who arent speaking to each other, but then he gets caught..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The arrival of a famous physicist, has Sheldon and Leonard competing for her attention..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard tells Penny the story of how he met Sheldon..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: In the third-season finale, Wolowitz and Koothrappali play matchmaker for Sheldon by setting up an online-dating profile for him. Meanwhile, Penny thinks that her relationship with Leonard has affected her ability to date "normal" men..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: In the fourth-season opener, Sheldon goes on a date with Amy Fowler, his first date ever, and Penny finds herself accompanying them..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon hatches a plan to extend his lifespan when he realises he wont be around to see the technology that will be able to download his consciousness into a robot..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Everyone worries for Sheldon, who begins searching for non-human companionship..
